nodes.text: The Ahakista system was a star system which contained Ahakista. During the reign of the Galactic Empire, the Dug gambler Gronson Takkaro fell into debt on Ahakista but then skipped bail and fled the system to the planet Lothal. The bounty hunter Bossk chased Takkaro down to Lothal, where he had to explain about Takkaro's past in the Ahakista system.
